Collection.LongName: Ground-based in-situ trace gas and UV measurements at Edgewood Site maded during the first deployment of the Deriving Information on Surface Conditions from Column and Vertically Resolved Observations Relevant to Air Quality project (DISCOVER-AQ_Ground_insitu_TraceGas_UV_Data)
Collection.Description: Ground-based in-situ trace gas and UV measurements at Edgewood Site

Address.StreetAddress: NASA Langley Research Center Mail Stop 157D

Platform.LongName: A set of ground based instruments measuring atmospheric properties located at Bakersfield, California.

Sensor.LongName: An instrument used to separate, detect, and analyze the compounds in a gaseous mixture by the principles of gas chromatography.
Gas Chromatography/Mass Spectrometry using Isotopically Labeled Standards
